channel.title: Is there anyway to edit pk points?
channel.description: because some players on my server has their friends make new accs over and over so they could get higher pk points so i was wondering if theres a way to edit them.

item.title: Is there anyway to edit pk points?
item.dc:creator: @ilovelamp ilovelamp
item.description:
@ilovelamp wrote:

why not just ban the players? And I think pk points is a weak system, because you can’t really do much to protect it from people exploiting it’s weaknesses, other than banning people and editing the points, which is not efficient at all.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there anyway to edit pk points?

item.title: Is there anyway to edit pk points?
item.dc:creator: @tajkillerscape tajkillerscape
item.description:
@tajkillerscape wrote:

If you go into characters and search for you file… open it up and look for your pk points then edit them.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there anyway to edit pk points?

item.title: Is there anyway to edit pk points?
item.dc:creator: @i_wrecked_i i_wrecked_i
item.description:
@i_wrecked_i wrote:

oh, lmao the only place i didnt look ahah. anyways thanks so much man.

Read full topic
item.source: Is there anyway to edit pk points?

item.title: Is there anyway to edit pk points?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Go into their “more info” file, click their char file, and in the list of things like deaths = 14 or something like that, there should be pk points = * change the *

Read full topic
item.source: Is there anyway to edit pk points?
